Text: Thank you so much for getting this up so quick. I was really hoping you\'d have the after the catch as well... nI am crossing my fingers that you will have the tribute to Phil Harris next week though.nThanks again!!!!!

nevermind, they were hyping this on tv and radio ads all week, to maximize their profit off of Phil Harris\'s death.
